@Slf4j
public class Demo2 {

    private int count = 0;

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Demo2 demo2 = new Demo2();
       demo2.Demo2();
    }
    public static void Demo1() {
        /**
         * 1. staticæ˜¯é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿå«ç±»æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåœ¨JVMåˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå°±ä¼šåœ¨å†…å­˜åˆ†é…ä¸€å—å†…å­˜ï¼Œæˆä¸ºé™æ€åŒº

        int count = 1;
    }

    public void Demo2(){
        System.out.println(this);
        System.out.println(this.count);
    }

}

java
public class DynamicLinkingTest {

    int num = 10;

    public void methodA(){
        System.out.println("methodA()....");
    }

    public void methodB(){
        System.out.println("methodB()....");

        methodA();

        num++;
    }

}
